website_summaries.verdict: The PS3 Wireless Keypad is the best way to chat with friends and browse the Internet on the PlayStation 3.
pros: Most convenient way to chat with friends on PS3
makes PlayStation Home communication a lot easier
touch-pad functionality acts as a mouse
keyboard will work with any Bluetooth device
cons: requires separate power and Bluetooth connection
no included USB cable for charging

customer_reviews.title: A good quality bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in 2013 when ps3 was on it's way out. It's good quality and functioned well, but it's a bad design. having the keypad on the far side of the controller instead of the side closer to you as you hold the controller means that to use the keypad you have to drastically change how you're holding the controller. So for occasional use it's fine, but if you're trying to answer multiple messages in a row it's uncomfortable and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jester_84-07

customer_reviews.title: Defective!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well first off I got my PS3 keypad and i received it defective and not working but it looks brand new on the outside but it won’t turn on but They get back to you once you contact customer service they might take a day or two but they help you
customer_reviews.author: Toni M.

customer_reviews.title: A true time saver
customer_reviews.text: Still in the box! It was a great value and makes logging i. To Hulu, Netflix, Amazon and Youtube on my PS3 so much easier. Highly recommend this for any gamer.
customer_reviews.author: K177y

customer_reviews.title: Great for PC Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Used this with a PS3 controller mapped to my PC to play Star Wars: The Old Republic (SWTOR). This keyboard works great and has a touchpad built in, which many people don't realize. This works great on PC, though I've never even tried it on my PS3! The buttons are very small, but the keypad strikes a good balance between size and weight. The charge holds up very well and I've never had the battery run out during use. I've made a video of SWTOR gameplay using a PS3 controller with this keypad and uploaded it to YouTube at
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: With limited solutions, this does the job
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone will agree that almost anything is better than trying to use the PS3 controller to type anything. We use the console at home not just for gaming but also for watching movies and occasional web browsing. I tested this out and it synced painlessly and worked very well. I agree with some of the other reviewers saying it could really use a back light and that the keys are fairly small but otherwise it feels very solid. The clip mechanism is strong and it might take some people a few days to get used to because of the positioning but overall for $10-15 this is a no-brainer even if you don't think you'll use it often.
customer_reviews.author: A to the K

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My friend has one of these, and he convinced me to get it, insisting it would make typing easier. I don't like it... for me, it make typing harder. The buttons are tiny and glossy, so my fingers are constantly hitting the wrong keys. My other complaint is that it also made my controller much heavier, so every time I set the controller down to rest, the L2 and R2 buttons would get pressed (depending on what game you're playing, this can be seriously annoying). Don't let my review stop you from giving it a try, if you still want it. My friend absolutely loves it, and says it's flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok but bad design
customer_reviews.text: It fits well on the controller. I purchased it because I didn't want to use a bluetooth keyboard or have it sitting around my house. Unfortunately it needs independent charging. Unlike the Xbox 360 keypad which uses the connection directly to the remote this needs to be charged separately then it simply "grasps" onto the remote. I don't know why they couldn't use the USB connection on the Controller to attach this and not have to charge it separately but that is my only complaint. It does have an ON/OFF switch so that is a plus to keeping it charged. My first full charge of the keypad took over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine but wished it ran off the controller battery but also like the separate power for it so my controller lasts longer
customer_reviews.author: Estevon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Its worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy an it was also worth buy to text back to my friend's on PSN
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: My what fat fingers you have. The better to eat you with? What?
customer_reviews.text: This is great little keyboard that attaches directly to a dual shock 3 PS3 controller. It doesn't get in the way of the trigger keys and stay on securely. There is even a touch sensitive portion of the keyboard for quick navigation of the PS3s menu. I have enormously fat sausage fingers, I mean like scary big, hard to look at, even harder to look away from, hot dog digits. Even with my shortcomings in the phalanges department, this keyboard is pretty easy to use. Makes typing a whole lot easier than using the controller with standard typing.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Small problem, but the product works fine
customer_reviews.text: The product had a slight defect, one for this I had to make a small modification to the plastic base softening it with heat, but in summary the electronic part works well
customer_reviews.author: Luis David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: when i first saw this item, i saw it at a store. it was selling for $40. i checked on amazon and the price was only $30. the shipping was extremely fast and i got my package hand delivered to me. i am using the ps3 wireless keypad right now to write this review. this is a great product. dont buy any of those cheap knockoff keypads. spend the couple extra bucks and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good for browsing online and sending quick messages
customer_reviews.text: I don't send a lot of IM's or do a lot of browsing, but for the once in awhile that I do it was a big pain...this is a great tool to help alleviate that for me...whether it was worth the money or not...jury is still out on that. It does make the controller feel a little top heavy, but I'm assuming I'll get used to it after awhile. I have seen cheaper knockoffs that are a controller + keypad in one - please note that those use a USB dongle to connect therefore they are not bluetooth like this device is.
customer_reviews.author: R. Saini

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for typing
customer_reviews.text: I hate using the controller to type this makes it a breeze to enter into the PS3. Was not expecting it to be a standalone device though requiring it to be plugged into the PS3 with it's own battery. I assumed it fit over the remote and tapped into it's battery or something. My only issue is between it's uses the battery dies every single time and for some reason even though I leave it plugged it, it does not charge automatically when I turn on my PS3 to keep it up to levels. I have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it to start charging.
customer_reviews.author: Nexant

customer_reviews.title: easier tipping
customer_reviews.text: Good when you need to type text. internet navigation, for example
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Uehoka

customer_reviews.title: For the Perfect Occasion
customer_reviews.text: This was quite a big deal back in the day when voice chat was still a discretion to online players and searching for things in particular on the Internet or whatever multimedia app you had on your system. And even when you don't need the accessory for the time being, it doesn't get in your way and you can keep it on your controller without it weighing you down.
customer_reviews.author: Oddbrother

customer_reviews.title: little, fully funtional, excellent
customer_reviews.text: this is a "have to" accesory for your PS3, not only to write over a chat in the network with your ps3, I bougth to test with my laptop. I had a wireless keyboard with a touchpad mouse but with batteries and all this problem to recharge and the size, it died later 2 months of use... bad!... BUT with this little keyboard is like I write over my blackberry, nice... and the touchpad mouse (when I activate) was excellent for me. Best limited funtions wireless keyboard bluetooth portable and little I ever have.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Roman

customer_reviews.title: A Tepid Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I don't really love this item. It's about what I thought it would be, but I think I was hoping it would be a little better. The keys are a little too smooth and hard to see. Although it's faster than using the controller, it's nowhere near as fast as just using a regular keyboard, which can be easily stored to the side. It's really not bad at all. It's just not great.It does fit nicely to the controller and it holds a charge for a long time. No connectivity issues or stability issues.
customer_reviews.author: LAWJR3

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work all that great.. It's neat how it tracks you finger but just not as awesome as I though it would be... I wanted to send it back but never heard back from vend so I ended up keeping it.. Might just be a steep learning curve .. But I would suggest only buying it at the lowest price you can find or you might feel cheated... At the least, my controller looks cool like it's off of a batman utility belt! Lol... Wouldn't buy another one though...:(
customer_reviews.author: J. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyboard small enough to keep in the storage of my home theater seating with my remote controls, but functional enough to make typing up messages to my friends less difficult. This certainly fits both of those criteria. Easy to type on, charge lasts a loooong time, and doesn't change the dynamics of the controller during gaming at all. I'm not completely sold on the "touch mouse" functionality, it's a little wonky, but that isn't why I bought it. For me, it cost the same as a standard wireless keyboard and took up much less space, so i'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good attachment, very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this keyboard to play a mmo on the ps3 which usually requires some for of communication between players. Normally that is a daunting task when using the pop up keyboard and the d-pad or thumbstick. This made conversing with the other players much easier and closer to real time. The rechargeable battery lasts longer than the controllers charge time, the weight when placed onto the controller is negligible, and if you have to plug the controller in you don't have to remover the keyboard to access the micro usb port if you use a usb cable. All in all, it was a very sound investment.
customer_reviews.author: kyuubi

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products of it's kind
customer_reviews.text: This is the most innovative products out there for gaming. It's slim & lightweight design, smooth easy slide texture & buttons, bluetooth connection, and seamless integration makes this a hard to top product. Once you understand and master the keys and locations, you'll wonder why you didn't get this sooner. The rechargable battery saves you money, fears of corrosion, & having to hunt down batteries (recharge time is short). There's a a short-cut to your friends lists, a mouse feature, & message button. Really, what are you waiting for, buy this now if you haven't, and while you're at get a bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.author: smstevenms

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard, PS3 clip-on
customer_reviews.text: Nice gadget! Well built, well thought out, but NOT a replacement for a full size keyboard. It clips on & off the Dualshock3 PS3 controller perfectly. It charges from any regular Saxaxis or USB charger power source. This mini keyboard is actually a standalone device that just happens to clip perfectly onto a PS3 game controller. It also makes surfing the internet on the PS3's disgracefully poor web browser a little more fun. I would recommend this product to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: ElectroJake

customer_reviews.title: y 4 star on my list?
customer_reviews.text: a really good thing to have if you either talk to someone a lot, or you surf the web. if you do not think you do either of those things as much as you think you do, then do not buy it. because it is expensive. also it has no light, if you don't think thats a big factor, than congrats this is the keypad for you...you do know that you can also connect your regular computer usb keyboard with the ps3?..right? i knew that but i still got it...because it makes little conversations really fun, without the trouble to plug things
customer_reviews.author: eno

customer_reviews.title: Great way to text / message your friends
customer_reviews.text: I'm no longer using PS3 now .. I've moved onto PS4.. but while I was still playing PS3, this Wireless Keypad was a constant companion. I loved it. Incidentally, I also tried one made by a third party, but it worked horribly .. the keys were unresponsive and slow to type. But this is the official Sony Wireless Keypad and this one works AWESOME. Looks great too, and does not interfere at all with any of the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Caters to small fingers...
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know.... I should have known. I just got tired of the default way of typing messages on the PS3; so I just had to give this a try. I realize now that I am better off just going the old fashioned way due to the fact that I miss type the whole time. I'm hittin' two buttons the entire time. Not to down the product because it's not defective. It just isn't for me and my fat thumbs.
customer_reviews.author: OT

customer_reviews.title: Good little keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine though I personally type faster with the joysticks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Given to my nephew who used it alot, works great he said.
customer_reviews.author: RKB

customer_reviews.title: Better than using the PS3 remote and wireless compared to USB Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice KeyPad if you chat over the PS3 via home or messaging. Kinda feels as Texting is over a cell phone. So typing is not as good as a usb keyboard but its wireless and not as baulky. Also is much much much better than PS3's onscreen keyboard and thats where I gave it the most stars. Over all This product feels good quality at the sametime being small/wireless plus its link and use (so no fighting with the PS3).
customer_reviews.author: Big Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Works but could use a LOT of improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's a chat pad all right. If I were to complain I would say that the buttons are to small and my hands are not that big. Though I may make a few mistakes typing I would have to say it still is a lot faster than the in game chat. I wish that the chat pad would be down and not up on the controller so I don't have to feel like I need to stretch to type.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Must have in my opinion ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine anyone who has had to type on the PS3 not being frustrated by it. This is a great addition. It's actually a shame that Sony wouldn't provide this out of the box with the PS3. Nevertheless this I believe is well spent 20 bucks and takes away my only frustration with the PS3. I strongly recommend it. More details - It fits nicely on the controller, you can hardly tell that they are separate pieces once you have put them together. It doesn't look awkward or ugly. The size is just right and build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: hchari

customer_reviews.title: ps3 wireless keypad
customer_reviews.text: The pad came a few day prior to estimated delivery date and was in a well packaged box with no damaged found on unit. I had purchased this unit for my grandson who promptly charged it up. He stated it did in fact make thing easier when text was being made and that it appeared to hold a good charge. It easily fit onto his controller and his nimble fingers were fast at work with chatting to other.
customer_reviews.author: one2enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks SONY!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! is a easy snap on to the PS3 controller and it fits perfectly. It does not get in the way of the control handling. In the picture it may look like it would interfere with the L & R buttons, but in no way it does. It is also extremely easy to get it synced up to the PS3. Here's what I did and what I recommend: Once you receive it, connect it to the PS3 with a charging cable... (that is it!) sync complete, start using product. The only thing I dislike about the product is using it in the dark. Maybe illuminated letters will help. Still love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Demetrio Diaz-Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Very handy gaming device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy tool when gaming, browsing internet, or your favorite video streaming service. It eliminates the task of scrolling for every letter, just type away. It's compact enough that you can leave it on during normal game play but big enough you can easily type. About the size of typical phone keyboard. Definately worth the money if you do a lot of keying on your playstation.
customer_reviews.author: AaronSquire

customer_reviews.title: Love this Typer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little Querty keyboard! It could have been designed a little bit better ergonomically, but it works well. I've noticed that the new PS4 design is much easier to use as it is on the inside of the controller making it easier to reach with all fingers, but this one works well also.
customer_reviews.author: David John Wennerlyn

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, all will ENVY you!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome, simply look great on a PS3 CONTROLER, fits perfectly and pays itself when surfing the web or when you are on the Play Station Life. People be crying when you ask, why you type sow slow?, and the ster I don't have keyboard, lol, i hate that waiting for people to try to type fast. well, onestly haven't seen some one say that is to much, or is to heavy, or nothing bad when they come to my house to play and use it. 100% Recomended by me. My web page is: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PS3 though alitte less inconvient for PS4 players
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it's compatible with the PS4 even if not all buttons function when using the PS4. My only gripe with it is that the buttons are so small but for those used to using a cellphone keypad it shouldn't be a problem. For the PS3 it's perfect but for the PS4 you cannot clip the keyboard on the controller for obvious reasons but it still gets the job done separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: buy one!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on the controller, keeps a good amount of charge. Doesn't get in the way, although it does add some weight to your controller. makes messages easier to type.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lightning08

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory if you plan to text chat in games, or use the PS3's browser function to surf the web, visit Hulu or YouTube, etc. Clicky QWERTY keyboard makes thumb typing a breeze. Unit also has a touchpad mode if mousing with the analogue stick isn't your thing. It's independent of the gamepad with it's own BlueTooth and power, so you can use it even without attaching it to a gamepad. Worth the purchase IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Erik J / TKSnake / Obsidius

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, snaps on to controller perfectly, battery life is semi short but it recharges fine. lasts about one or two controller lives. if you turn it off in between uses, it will last a long time. you might want to make sure your fingers are small though. if you have normal sized or large thumbs... not your product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this works good for typing on your ps3 instead of using the controller
customer_reviews.author: chillichill79

customer_reviews.title: PS3 wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique keypad that allows it to be attached to any PS3 controller,It is wireless and is very handy on certian games and going online with your PS3. After attaching , which is very easy, it fits and looks like it was always on the controller.You hardly notice it while game playing. Amazing little gadget . I recommend this to all PS3 users.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this online as a gift, I thought it was a larger keyboard, but it actually clips onto the game controller, and it about as big as a cell phone, but it's great! I hate using the controller to click by every letter to enter in any text on my ps3 - SO annoying, but the buttons aren't too small, and it's easy to type pretty fast with it. Good Product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Keypad charges separately from controller; is on a separate ...
customer_reviews.text: Keypad charges separately from controller; is on a separate BT channel than controller(s). Unclear if you can have more than one in use (I didn't see any documentation about it.) It just snaps onto the controller (or can be used standalone).
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've own this product for more than a year and all I can say is: Pros: - The battery life is AMAZING... it last more than a month! - Easy to attach to controller - Very useful buttons on the pad. - Increases the weight of the controller, making it be a controller for BIG MACHO Cons: - The charging USB cord is not included - A little bit overpriced - Touch pad IS HORRIBLE. Pointer on the screen doesn't stay in one place. - When you shake it, sounds like some elemente inside has detached
customer_reviews.author: Glendy R

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: i connected this to my ps3 with ease you dont necessarily need to have it on your ps3 controller to type. the fuctions are useful like the button to go straight to messages. it has a cool button that makes it act as a mouse but i dont really need that since im not on the web browser at all. as a bonus you can also pair it to anything else to use as a mini keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: elvys

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work for FFXIV
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work with FFXIV. Our understanding is that the makers of FFXIV have to make improvements to their software to allow it to be used. It works in other applications. I tried to use this in May 2014.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceWeepul

customer_reviews.title: Works better disconnected from the controller
customer_reviews.text: The keys are much to out of reach for a natural feeling keypad. I have found though that it works great when you hold the keypad by itself in your hand and use it to type with. They keys are pretty small as well. It takes a little getting used to, but if you are willing to use it separately from the controller, and you can get used to the smaller keys, then it's still only OK.
customer_reviews.author: Spoonard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Keypad
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get used to so as to not have to look down at what you're trying to type, but after that, it's incredibly useful and fun to use. The battery life also seems to last a very long time, but you can't check and see that, as there's no battery gauge either on the keypad or in the console menu. Finally, it's nice that it's Bluetooth, and therefore requires no keeping a track of a dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard for PS3
customer_reviews.text: I got this keyboard to type faster when going online with my PS 3 web browser. I got it after comparing it to the logitech full wirelss keyboard. Overall, it was cheaper but it is really very small and using it is like typing on a smart phone keypad! Also there is no back light on the keys which makes it harder to see in dim light room. Now I am not using it that much. I guess I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: Great product..Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Makes it so much easier for him to type.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanlea Kirk

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove It is made by Sony so it ...
customer_reviews.text: fits like a glove It is made by Sony so it performs as intended with no issue, excellent build quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Prisbrey

customer_reviews.title: I bought this so I could type easily while playing Final Fantasy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could type easily while playing Final Fantasy: XIV. It did not disappoint and made communicating very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for MMO text chatting
customer_reviews.text: This is what you need if you play M.M.O.s and like to chat. It is not a second party item so you dont have to worry about syncing issued as it was made by Sony specificly for the ps3. It has a touch pad which is kinda wonky and sensative but works as a mouse on the internet browser . It has a nice solid feel to it and connects to the controller really easy. It dosent even have to be connect to the controller if you dont want. Because its Bluetooth you can connect it to other devices as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It does what it does.
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain too much. the trackpad feature is why I bought it, and I guess that is okay for what the PS3 is. It's a shame that Sony really could have revolutionized the living room with equipment like this, and instead conceded the market share to better services like Google TV or Apple TV. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Vågen

customer_reviews.title: Must have if playing Defiance or any other game that requires text
customer_reviews.text: Connected easy works great.....one thing that I was really shocked out to find out was the hidden touch pad on the keypad..pretty neat makes this all the more better. Really only bought because defiance chat is working and needed something to type that was easier then connecting an actual keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good ship speed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good ship speed, good internal battery. Does everything I needed. It's not to big and it sits on the controller perfectly. Definitely recommended if you play games with constant text. (Online MMO)
customer_reviews.author: Juney

customer_reviews.title: this is great, though the keys are very small
customer_reviews.text: this is great, though the keys are very small. people with very big hands might find it annoying. its a nice mini keyboard that fits onto the controller however. this thing was essential for text communication games. i mainly used it for little big planet in which case its practically mandatory.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well. the vertual mouse works as well with no real issues. My big complaint is that it mounts in front of the controller and is not easy nor comfortable to use as a thumb pad. If it were desighned to be like the xbox 360 thumb pad it would have been great. But if you need to actualy type emails of something long it is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Best for tiny fingers
customer_reviews.text: How handy! Wish that I had found this sooner. Best for tiny fingers.
customer_reviews.author: westinflorida

customer_reviews.title: Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Another surprise for my son. He had mentioned wanting a keyboard for his PS3, but did not put it on his wish list. I read the reviews on this item and most were good. He uses it often. Yes it is small. It attaches to the PS3 controller. It works fine for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Crowbuy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not much tactile feel, requires a seperate USB cable for charging, buttons a bit too small, method for activating alternative characters are not as intuitive as they could be, doesn't feel to add much bulk or weight to the controller though, grips on with reasonable strength
customer_reviews.author: John Glen

customer_reviews.title: Great Keypad!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This keypad is great for fast typing especially texting friends and going on the internet. It also has a scroll pad like a mouse. Its sleek and makes the controller look loaded. But if you put a skin on the controller you may not be able to have an easy time pressing the ps button, select, or pause buttons. But other than that this item is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful a must have!
customer_reviews.text: it integrates nicely into the controller, it doesn't add weight or make it unweildy, and you absolutely need it if you plan to play online or like to chat with friends! I cant tell you how long it took me to type before getting this, now I use it all the time. Great product, great battery life, great everything. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: yeah Its good
customer_reviews.text: It works and everything is awesome, buttons work, charge works, turns right on and off, perfect....except...i think I prefer the key below between the handles than above the the L and R buttons
customer_reviews.author: David Slay

customer_reviews.title: real easy to search the internet with this keyboard and its ...
customer_reviews.text: real easy to search the internet with this keyboard and its very well made was worth the money since im always messaging with friends
customer_reviews.author: jesus espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, fits good and snug.
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Some of us older folks will need to wear magnifiers to see the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: morphine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: talk about Convenience easy to use very heavy for a keypad without the ps3 controller feels very well made but that's basically what you get when you buy something SONY developed high grade not cheap at all, highly recommended seller
customer_reviews.author: TwizzPrime

customer_reviews.title: Works well, just remember to read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little to get use to. My husband (who I bought it for) throw away the instructions, thus did not know it needed to be plugged in via USB to charge, or that there was an on/off switch. Once all that was figured out it worked great. Instructions are important.
customer_reviews.author: WArnold

customer_reviews.title: love this.
customer_reviews.text: A true lifesaver if you use your PS3 as a netflix streaming device
customer_reviews.author: jessica cuccia

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The claw works awesome with de controller, is not as uncomfortable as you might think, then again getting used to it is a bit tricky and might take you some time, aside from some minor upsetting moments (sometimes doesn't recognizes caps or symbols) is a good trade for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I connect to the internet with my PS3, and overall, I'm happy with it. The keys are small, but not too small, and if you can send text messages on a QWERTY cell phone pad then this should be no problem. Only complaint I have is that they keypad should have been lit so we could see them in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: NJOS

customer_reviews.title: Super handy! Works well
customer_reviews.text: Super handy! Works well, doesn't get in the way, not too heavy on the controller. Holds a charge decently well and charges pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: DecemberBLUE07

customer_reviews.title: in my opinion this is a kind of a useless addon for the ps3 but always cool to own ...
customer_reviews.text: in my opinion this is a kind of a useless addon for the ps3 but always cool to own if you decide to have a full blown chat with someone on the crappy msger .
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: This was great for communicating in FFXIV o the PS3, but I switched to a wireless keyboard when I switched to PS4. I like the wireless full keyboard setup better, but when I first started this little guy was a great way to get into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Key pad
customer_reviews.text: Great design rarely use it just bought it to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jbmeb

customer_reviews.title: Love this accessory
customer_reviews.text: Love this accessory. Actually purchased it years ago (board at work now so going through my Amazon reviews) and never had an issue. Still works today and would recommend it to anyone looking for a different way to type while on the PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if you actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: Great little keypad, I have had this for quite a while now. However, I have found with time it becomes too cumbersome for the amount of time I am actually typing with it. It has spent more time in my cabinet than on my controller.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Gentle touch
customer_reviews.text: The hook brakes very easily but it is a great keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gross

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kid's wont use it cause they are spoiled by headsets! Not Manufactures fault.
customer_reviews.author: Robcobb

customer_reviews.title: Good idea. Pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: Adds too much bulk to your controller so you will probably play most of the time without it on. Typing is cumbersome and you have to relearn the pad to use it well. I would suggest you spend money on a bluetooth small regular keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Madan Soundar

customer_reviews.title: PS3 Wireless Keypad
customer_reviews.text: This little device works like a charm. Took a little getting use to the added weight and new feel of the controller. I am a serious online gamer and thought it would affect my play. After about 30 min of play, forgot it was even there. The instruction manual for pad can be found online.
customer_reviews.author: br3400

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Keypad PS3
customer_reviews.text: The unit functions well for its intended purpose, however, an illuminated keyboard or desk lamp is necessary. When connected to a controller, it isn't easy to type with, probably just me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Al G.

customer_reviews.title: buy this you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very functional addition to the ps3. ergonomically speaking this is brilliant, it does not get in the way of the shoulder buttons, the trackpad function works well, comes with a built in lithium battery,
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This keypad is meant for: (1) someone with very small hands and (2) someone with good eyesight. If you're over 40 & can't see small text worth a squat, don't even bother with this keypad. I'm selling mine & getting a near-regular size keyboard for use with my PS3.
customer_reviews.author: gmt7k

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Hooks over the top of the controller and is bulky. Buttons are really small but I guess I could get used to them if I used it enough. Unfortunately, I don't. It interrupts my gameplay and was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: not for ps2 on PS3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for ff 11 on PS3 but ps2 operation on PS3 doesn't work for it. I ended up using it on ff14 works fine for that game
customer_reviews.author: derrick

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini pad so I can type in youtube from the ps3. I was disappointed to find out that you cannot use this mini keyboard to do searches in youtube through the ps3. WEAK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great design that works well.
customer_reviews.text: This keypad is designed very well. It fits on the PS3 controller perfectly and does not get in the way of gameplay. Of course, it is not as fast as typing on a full size keyboard, but it is compact and allows me to type way faster than finding the letters with the directional control. If speed is what you're going for, get a USB keyboard (it will save you about $30 dollars too).
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boys...they liked it but the keys are too small....gets in the way of the controller...loose connection. .. Was an ok purchase but dont recommend it... prefer the wireless keyboard instead
customer_reviews.author: cecilia dickson

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed with this little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son as a Christmas gift he stuck it in the drawer and we ended up selling it later you have to have very tiny fingers.
customer_reviews.author: CRIXUS

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for role playing games that require a keyboard. Perfect fit on PS3 controller. Battery life last forever. I've been using it often since September 2013 and only had to charge battery twice. If you can text message efficiently, you can use this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Typing made easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this keyboard!!! It enhances your PS3 experience to another level!!! I really love it for Searches, YouTube, and other apps where you have to type in full sentences. Saves a lot of time and very easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ace Sax

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great especially when use on Playstation home. Yes the buttons are small but they have a good tatical feel. The reason for 4 stars is that the touchpad mode doesn't work that well.The unit attaches firmly to the playstation controller. I was worried that it might try to move or shift when I saw how it attached, but that has not been the case.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walterscheid

customer_reviews.title: Great Keypad......its been of much use for me
customer_reviews.text: Well its almost perfect if you plan to chat a lot and if u are the one that like to use your play station for internet jobs and so on.... You have to get used to the touch pad mode...sometimes jump the pointer to nowhere but its not that bad just a little of practice... one thing i wanted on this its some kind of glint on the keys you know when you are playing in total dark or something like that ...only that
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: An "OK" add-on
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. If you don't have a keyboard hooked up to your PS3, this is a much better solution than typing through the many keystrokes on PS3 controller itself to get a letter. There is sometimes a lag between when you press the letter and when it registers on screen. It will take a while to get used to where all your symbols and puntuation characters are. Out of the 3 ways to "type" on a PS3...this is the 2nd best. 1) A USB or bluetooth full size keyboard 2) PS3 Wireless Keypad (this product) 3) Not get anything and struggle!
customer_reviews.author: Keyzman

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Im a little disappointed since this is a sony product I expected better. I got skinny fingers and find it hard to type on this thing at a decent speed. And it's really easy to accidentally hit the PS button while hitting the start button.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. It is hard to see in not well lit spaces. And I wish the buttons were bigger or wider. That would make them easier to find without looking all the time. Kind of like the ENV Touch phone. But it is amazing for how small it is how much stuff they have put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Moss

customer_reviews.title: but maybe it would be pretty good, normally
customer_reviews.text: Could not use it because the hook was busted, but maybe it would be pretty good, normally, that's why I put ok. But if the stableizing hook was busted, maybe that part breaks easily, so maybe its a one star.
customer_reviews.author: Spee

customer_reviews.title: Good Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Great keypad, you can also use it as a quick-mouse by moving the keys. There are buttons similar to a shift key, but they control things like symbols. A lot easier than using just the controller.
customer_reviews.author: AnimalCracker

product_meta.title: PS3 Wireless Keypad
product_meta.description:
The Wireless keypad for the PlayStation 3 system provides the freedom of easy to use texting and mouse input capabilities, all while maintaining full gameplay functionality in one easy-to-hold device. This Bluetooth device attaches to any Dualshock 3 or Sixaxis wireless controller and enables effortless internet browsing, e-mailing and instant messaging on the PlayStation Network and PlayStation Home. The unique touch pad feature allows for convenient scrolling and mouse input on the PS3 system on screen display. Dedicated short cut keys provide instant access to 'Message Box' and other online communication applications on the PlayStation Network.

AMAZON.COM
The Wireless Keypad for the Sony PlayStation 3 turns your regular controller into a texting device with mouse input capabilities, while still maintaining full gameplay functionality. This Blue tooth device attaches to any DualShock 3 or SixAxis wireless controller and enables effortless Internet browsing, emailing and instant messaging on the PlayStation Network and PlayStation Home.

 

QWERTY Keypad Mimics Smartphones
Adding the wireless keypad turns your regular wireless controller into a easy-to-hold, multifunctional device. Mimicking the QWERTY keypad on smartphones, this device is also designed for fast, thumbs-only typing. The unique touchpad feature allows for convenient scrolling and mouse for the PlayStation 3 on-screen display. When you touchpad is pressed, you can not use the keys for character input, but you can slide your finger on this area to select something on screen. Blue tooth 2.0, Short Cut Keys, and More
Dedicated short-cut keys provide time-saving instant access to Message Box and other online communication applications on the PlayStation Network. This device charges by connecting it directly to the PlayStation 3 system using a standard USB cable. It is important to note that this device features Blue tooth 2.0, with an operating range of up to 33 feet, and it comes equipped with a rechargeable Lithium-ion polymer battery (Capacity: 610mAh).

 By integrating all these features into a sleek and elegant design you can further enhance your online interactivity on the PlayStation 3 system.
feature_bullets: Wireless Keypad for the PS3 turns your regular controller into a texting device with mouse input capabilities
Attaches to any DualShock 3 or SixAxis wireless controller
QWERTY keypad is designed for fast, thumbs-only typing
Touchpad mouse allows for convenient scrolling and selection
Designed with Bluetooth 2.0 and a rechargeable Lithium-ion polymer battery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars758 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
